meanings.sent1: The joeys hopped around playfully in the grass.
meanings.sent2: The mother kangaroo carried her joeys in her pouch.
meanings.sent3: The zookeeper joked that the joeys were having a hopping good time.
meanings.sent4: The joeys peeked out of their mother's pouch like curious little explorers.
meanings.sent5: The joeys' soft fur and big eyes made them irresistible to visitors.

meanings.sent1: Every morning, she enjoyed a steaming hot joeys to start her day.
meanings.sent2: The cafe served delicious joeys to its customers.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally spilled his joeys all over his desk, creating a coffee-scented mess.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly brewed joeys filled the room, awakening everyone's senses.
meanings.sent5: She savored every sip of the rich, flavorful joeys.
